com.ssdd.cs.bean

Class CriticalSectionMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.cs.bean.CriticalSectionMessage

  • public class CriticalSectionMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    types of messages used to synchronize between critical sections.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos

      private java.lang.String senderId

      the sender's lamport counter to update the reciver counter

      • hasPriority

        public boolean hasPriority(java.lang.String otherId,
                           LamportCounter otherTime)
        Compares two messages to know if other node has priority over this message.
        Parameters:
        otherId - other node's id
        otherTime - other node's lamport time counter
        Returns:
        true if the other node has priority over current message
